body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our Car Dealership customer support. My name is Anthony Phillips and I will be assisting you today. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Alexis. To better assist you, may I have your phone number, and email address as well, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five - two three four - nine zero eight seven, and my email address is alexis.james@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Alexis. Could you also provide me with the exact model of the car you are inquiring about, as well as the date of purchase?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am inquiring about the SUV model, and I purchased it on October twelve, two zero two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for clarifying that, Alexis. I will look into the product quality issue you mentioned. If there's anything else you would like to add, feel free to let me know.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help in resolving this matter. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Alexis. Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have any further inquiries, don't hesitate to contact us. Have a great day!
